name: Thandor: The Invasion
description: This installer also requires the patch, see installer for download link. Patch MD5 is 4133020e5a7c9f74a633f586d231dc6b.Virustotal link: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/a6cd7445cd2ab6d36e00664b9b02d99d912704ad3fdfb98233b2705599437cf3/details
notes: For some resolutions thandor.dat must be edited manually, see LinuxReadme after install and check the provided config files in customConfigs_Tools)!

insert-disc.description: Choose installation media Info: For some resolutions thandor.dat must be edited manually or a existing custom one must be moved from customConfigs_Tools!

content:
files:
- patch105: N/A:Download patch 1.05 from http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=09051709526305652937
    (md5 4133020e5a7c9f74a633f586d231dc6b)
- dinput: https://github.com/elishacloud/dinputto8/releases/download/v1.0.30.0/dinput.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/JoWood/Thandor/thandor.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: 'Choose installation media Info: For some resolutions thandor.dat
      must be edited manually or a existing custom one must be moved from customConfigs_Tools!'
    requires: Thandor/thandor.dat
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win95
    description: Using Windows 95 for setup
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win95
    executable: $DISC/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: e $dinput -o$CACHE/tmp/dinput
    file: 7z
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/JoWood/Thandor/
    src: $CACHE/tmp/dinput/dinput.dll
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/JoWood/Thandor/Flm
    src: $DISC/Thandor/Flm
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/JoWood/Thandor/
    file: patch105
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
require-binaries: 7z
system:
  env:
    LUTRIS_RUNTIME: '0'
wine:
  dxvk: false
  overrides:
    dinput.dll: native
